name: Sanchos Ball
description:
Wellcome to Sanchos Ball, a sample game from Slavs Make Games. Game is a part of learning project games in course SLAVS MAKE GAMES on Udemy. Game will be constantly updated.

Game instructions: Play with mouse left button. Goal is to hit different tile part with limited moves. To a achieve as much point in a less moves.

Learning project SLAVS MAKE GAMES

Simple course lesson (combination of few beginners lectures):

Game is completely made by code (GODOT GD Script)
